items.name: Aircraft Operational Status
items.comment: Identification of the operational services available in the aircraft while airborne.

items.name: RA
items.comment:
TCAS Resolution Advisory active
0 TCAS II or ACAS RA not active
1 TCAS RA active

items.name: TC
items.comment:
Target Trajectory Change Report Capability
0 no capability for Trajectory Change Reports
1 support for TC+0 reports only
2 support for multiple TC reports
3 reserved

items.name: TS
items.comment:
Target State Report Capability
0 no capability to support Target State Reports
1 capable of supporting target State Reports

items.name: ARV
items.comment:
Air-Referenced Velocity Report Capability
0 no capability to generate ARV-reports
1 capable of generate ARV-reports

items.name: CDTI/A
items.comment:
Cockpit Display of Traffic Information airborne
0 CDTI not operational
1 CDTI operational

items.name: Not TCAS
items.comment:
TCAS System Status
0 TCAS operational
1 TCAS not operational

items.name: SA
items.comment:
Single Antenna
0 Antenna Diversity
1 Single Antenna only

items.name: Data Source Identification
items.comment: Identification of the ADS-B station providing information.

data_fields.name: SAC
data_fields.comment: System Area Code

data_fields.name: SIC
data_fields.comment: System Identification Code

items.name: Service Identification
items.comment: Identification of the service provided to one or more users.

items.name: Service Management
items.comment: Identification of services offered by a ground station (identified by a SIC code).

data_fields.name: RP
data_fields.comment: Report Period

items.name: Emitter Category
items.comment: Characteristics of the originating ADS-B unit.

data_fields.name: ECAT
data_fields.comment:
0 No ADS-B Emitter Category Information
1 light aircraft <= 15500 lbs
2 15500 lbs < small aircraft <75000 lbs
3 75000 lbs < medium a/c < 300000 lbs
4 High Vortex Large
5 300000 lbs <= heavy aircraft
6 highly manoeuvrable (5g acceleration capability) and high speed (>400 knots cruise)
7 to 9 reserved
10 rotocraft
11 glider / sailplane
12 lighter-than-air
13 unmanned aerial vehicle
14 space / transatmospheric vehicle
15 ultralight / handglider / paraglider
16 parachutist / skydiver
17 to 19 reserved
20 surface emergency vehicle
21 surface service vehicle
22 fixed ground or tethered obstruction
23 cluster obstacle
24 line obstacle

items.name: Target Report Descriptor
items.comment: Type and characteristics of the data as transmitted by a system.

items.name: ATP
items.comment:
Address Type
0 24-Bit ICAO address
1 Duplicate address
2 Surface vehicle address
3 Anonymous address
4-7 Reserved for future use

items.name: ARC
items.comment:
Altitude Reporting Capability
0 25 ft
1 100 ft
2 Unknown
3 Invalid

items.name: RC
items.comment:
Range Check
0 Default
1 Range Check passed,CPR Validation pending

items.name: RAB
items.comment:
Report Type
0 Report from target transponder
1 Report from field monitor(fixed transponder)

items.name: DCR
items.comment:
Differential Correction
0 No differential correction (ADS-B)
1 Differential correction (ADS-B)

items.name: GBS
items.comment:
Ground Bit Setting
0 Ground Bit not set
1 Ground Bit set

items.name: SIM
items.comment:
Simulated Target
0 Actual target report
1 Simulated target report

items.name: TST
items.comment:
Test Target
0 Default
1 Test Target

items.name: SAA
items.comment:
Selected Altitude Available
0 Equipment capable to provide Selected
1 Altitude Equipment not capable to provide Selected Altitude

items.name: CL
items.comment:
Confidence Level
0 Report valid
1 Report suspect
2 No information
3 Reserved for future use

data_fields.name: Target Report Descriptor Second Extension : Error Conditions

items.name: LLC
items.comment:
List Lookup Check
0 default
1 List Lookup failed

items.name: IPC
items.comment:
Independent Position Check
0 default
1 Independent Position Check failed

items.name: NOGO
items.comment:
No-go Bit Status
0 NOGO-bit not set
1 NOGO-bit set

items.name: CPR
items.comment:
Compact Position Reporting
0 CPR Validation correct
1 CPR Validation failed

items.name: LDPJ
items.comment:
Local Decoding Position Jump
0 LDPJ not detected
1 LDPJ detected

items.name: RCF
items.comment:
Range Check
0 default
1 Range Check failed

items.name: Mode 3/A Code in Octal Representation
items.comment: Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation.

items.name: Mode-3/A
items.comment: Mode-3/A reply in octal representation

items.name: Time of Applicability for Position
items.comment: Time of applicability of the reported position, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

items.name: Time of Applicability for Velocity
items.comment: Time of applicability (measurement) of the reported velocity, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

items.name: Time of Message Reception for Position
items.comment: Time of reception of the latest position squitter in the Ground Station, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

data_fields.name: Time of Message Reception for Position

items.name: Time of Message Reception of Position-High Precision
items.comment: Time at which the latest ADS-B position information was received by the ground station, expressed as fraction of the second of the UTC Time.

data_fields.name: Time of Message Reception of Position-High Precision

items.name: FSI
items.comment:
Full Second Indication
3 Reserved
2 TOMRp whole seconds = (I021/073) Whole seconds – 1
1 TOMRp whole seconds = (I021/073) Whole seconds + 1
0 TOMRp whole seconds = (I021/073) Whole seconds

items.name: Time of Message Reception of Position - high precision
items.comment: Fractional part of the time of message reception for position in the ground station.

items.name: Time of Message Reception for Velocity
items.comment: Time of reception of the latest velocity squitter in the Ground Station, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

data_fields.name: Time of Message Reception of Velocity

items.name: Time of Message Reception of Velocity-High Precision
items.comment: Time at which the latest ADS-B velocity information was received by the ground station, expressed as fraction of the second of the UTC Time.

data_fields.name: Time of Message Reception of Velocity-High Precision

items.name: FSI
items.comment:
Full Second Indication
3 Reserved
2 TOMRv whole seconds = (I021/075) Whole seconds – 1
1 TOMRv whole seconds = (I021/075) Whole seconds + 1
0 TOMRv whole seconds = (I021/075) Whole seconds

items.name: Time of Message Reception of Velocity - high precision
items.comment: Fractional part of the time of message reception for velocity in the ground station.

items.name: Time of ASTERIX Report Transmission
items.comment: Time of the transmission of the ASTERIX category 021 report in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

items.name: Target Address
items.comment: Target address (emitter identifier) assigned uniquely to each target.

items.name: Quality Indicators
items.comment: ADS-B quality indicators transmitted by a/c according to MOPS version.

items.name: NUCr or NACv
items.comment: "Navigation Uncertainty Category for velocity" NUCr or the "Navigation Accuracy Category for Velocity" NACv

items.name: NUCp or NIC
items.comment: "Navigation Uncertainty Category for Position" NUCp or "Navigation Integrity Category "NIC"

data_fields.name: Quality Indicators First Extension : Navigation Accuracy Category for Position

items.name: NICbaro
items.comment: Navigation Integrity Category for Barometric Altitude

items.name: SIL
items.comment: Surveillance (version 1) or Source (version 2) Integrity Level

items.name: NACp
items.comment: Navigation Accuracy Category for Position

data_fields.name: Quality Indicators Second Extension : Position Quality Indicators

items.name: SIL-Supplement
items.comment:
SIL-Supplement
0 measured per flight-hour
1 measured per sample

items.name: SDA
items.comment: Horizontal Position System Design Assurance Level (as defined in version 2)

items.name: GVA
items.comment: Geometric Altitude Accuracy

data_fields.name: Quality Indicators Third Extension : Position Quality Indicators

items.name: PIC
items.comment: Position Integrity Category

items.name: NAV
items.comment:
0 Trajectory Intent Data is available for this aircraft
1 Trajectory Intent Data is not available for this aircraft

items.name: NVB
items.comment:
0 Trajectory Intent Data is valid
1 Trajectory Intent Data is not valid

items.name: TCA
items.comment:
0 TCP number available
1 TCP number not available

items.name: NC
items.comment:
0 TCP compliance
1 TCP non-compliance

items.name: TCP number
items.comment: Trajectory Change Point number

items.name: Altitude
items.comment:
Altitude in two’s complement form
-1500 ft <= altitude <= 150000 ft

items.name: Latitude
items.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement.
-90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

items.name: Longitude
items.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement.
-180 <= longitude < 180

items.name: Point Type
items.comment:
0 Unknown
1 Fly by waypoint (LT)
2 Fly over waypoint (LT)
3 Hold pattern (LT)
4 Procedure hold (LT)
5 Procedure turn (LT)
6 RF leg (LT)
7 Top of climb (VT)
8 Top of descent (VT)
9 Start of level (VT)
10 Cross-over altitude (VT)
11 Transition altitude (VT)

items.name: TD
items.comment:
0 N/A
1 Turn right
2 Turn left
3 No turn

items.name: TRA
items.comment:
Turn Radius Availabilty
0 TTR not available
1 TTR available

items.name: TOA
items.comment:
0 TOV available
1 TOV not available

items.name: TOV
items.comment: Time Over Point

items.name: TTR
items.comment:
TCP Turn radius
0 <= TTR <= 655.35 Nm

items.name: Position in WGS-84 Co-ordinates
items.comment: Position in WGS-84 Co-ordinates.

data_fields.name: Latitude
data_fields.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement.
Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude
data_fields.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement.
Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

items.name: High-Resolution Position in WGS-84 Co-ordinates
items.comment: Position in WGS-84 Co-ordinates in high resolution.

data_fields.name: Latitude
data_fields.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement.
Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude
data_fields.comment:
In WGS.84 in two’s complement.
Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

items.name: Message Amplitude
items.comment: Amplitude, in dBm, of ADS-B messages received by the ground station, coded in two’s complement.

data_fields.name: MAM
data_fields.comment: Message Amplitude

items.name: Geometric Height
items.comment: Minimum height from a plane tangent to the earth’s ellipsoid, defined by WGS-84, in two’s complement form.

data_fields.name: Geometric Height
data_fields.comment: -1500 ft <= Geometric Height <= 150000 ft

items.name: Flight Level
items.comment: Flight Level from barometric measurements, not QNH corrected, in two’s complement form.

data_fields.name: Flight Level
data_fields.comment: -15 FL <= Flight Level <= 1500 FL

items.name: Selected Altitude
items.comment: The Selected Altitude as provided by the avionics and corresponding either to the MCP/FCU Selected Altitude (the ATC cleared altitude entered by the flight crew into the avionics) or to the FMS Selected Altitude.

items.name: SAS
items.comment:
Source Availability
0 No source information provided
1 Source Information provided

items.name: Source
items.comment:
0 Unknown
1 Aircraft Altitude (Holding Altitude)
2 MCP/FCU Selected Altitude
3 FMS Selected Altitude

items.name: Altitude
items.comment:
Altitude in two’s complement form
-1300ft <= Altitude <= 100000ft

items.name: Final State Selected Altitude
items.comment: The vertical intent value that corresponds with the ATC cleared altitude, as derived from the Altitude Control Panel (MCP/FCU).

items.name: MV
items.comment:
Manage Vertical Mode
0 Not active or unknown
1 Active

items.name: AH
items.comment:
Altitude Hold Mode
0 Not active or unknown
1 Active

items.name: AM
items.comment:
Approach Mode
0 Not active or unknown
1 Active

items.name: Altitude
items.comment:
Altitude in in two’s complement form
-1300ft <= Altitude <= 100000ft

items.name: Air Speed
items.comment: Calculated Air Speed (Element of Air Vector).

items.name: IM
items.comment:
0 Air Speed = IAS
1 Air Speed = Mach

items.name: Air Speed
items.comment:
Air Speed (IAS or Mach)
if IAS, LSB = 2^-14 NM/s
if Mach, LSB = 0.001

items.name: RE
items.comment:
"Range Exceeded" Indicator
0 Value in defined range
1 Value exceeds defined range

items.name: Magnetic Heading
items.comment: Magnetic Heading (Element of Air Vector).

items.name: Barometric Vertical Rate
items.comment: Barometric Vertical Rate, in two’s complement form.

items.name: RE
items.comment:
"Range Exceeded" Indicator
0 Value in defined range
1 Value exceeds defined range

items.name: Geometric Vertical Rate
items.comment: Geometric Vertical Rate, in two’s complement form, with reference to WGS-84.

items.name: RE
items.comment:
"Range Exceeded" Indicator
0 Value in defined range
1 Value exceeds defined range

items.name: Airborne Ground Vector
items.comment: Ground Speed and Track Angle elements of Airborne Ground Vector.

items.name: RE
items.comment:
"Range Exceeded" Indicator
0 Value in defined range
1 Value exceeds defined range

items.name: Ground Speed
items.comment:
Ground Speed referenced to WGS-84
0 ≤ Ground Speed < 2 NM/s

data_fields.name: Track Angle
data_fields.comment: Track Angle clockwise reference to "True North"

items.name: Track Number
items.comment: An integer value representing a unique reference to a track record within a particular track file.

items.name: Track Number
items.comment: TRACK NUMBER(0...4095)

items.name: Track Angle Rate
items.comment: Rate of Turn, in two’s complement form.

items.name: TAR
items.comment:
Track Angle Rate
Maximum value = 16 °/s

items.name: Target Identification
items.comment: Target (aircraft or vehicle) identification in 8 characters, as reported by the target.

items.name: Target Status
items.comment: Status of the target

items.name: ICF
items.comment:
Intent Change Flag
0 No intent change active
1 Intent change flag raised

items.name: LNAV
items.comment:
LNAV Mode
0 LNAV Mode engaged
1 LNAV Mode not engaged

items.name: ME
items.comment:
0 No military emergency
1 Military emergency

items.name: PS
items.comment:
Priority Status
0 No emergency / not reported
1 General emergency
2 Lifeguard / medical emergency
3 Minimum fuel
4 No communications
5 Unlawful interference
6 "Downed" Aircraft

items.name: SS
items.comment:
Surveillance Status
0 No condition reported
1 Permanent Alert (Emergency condition)
2 Temporary Alert (change in Mode 3/A Code other than emergency)
3 SPI set

items.name: MOPS Version
items.comment: Identification of the MOPS version used by a/c to supply ADS-B information.

items.name: VNS
items.comment:
Version Not Supported
0 The MOPS Version is supported by the GS
1 The MOPS Version is not supported by the GS

items.name: VN
items.comment:
Version Number
This sub-field shall contain a value describing the MOPS used by each aircraft.
Currently defined for 1090 ES (LTT=2):
0 ED102/DO-260 [Ref. 8]
1 DO-260A [Ref. 9]
2 ED102A/DO-260B [Ref. 11]

items.name: LTT
items.comment:
Link Technology Type
0 Other
1 UAT
2 1090 ES
3 VDL 4
4-7 Not assigned

items.name: Met Information
items.comment: Meteorological information.

data_fields.name: Wind Speed
data_fields.comment: 0 <= Wind Speed <= 300

data_fields.name: Wind Direction
data_fields.comment: 1 <= Wind Direction <= 360

data_fields.name: Temperature
data_fields.comment: -100 °C <= Temperature <= 100 °C

data_fields.name: Turbulence
data_fields.comment: Integer between 0 and 15 inclusive

items.name: Roll Angle
items.comment: The roll angle, in two’s complement form, of an aircraft executing a turn.

data_fields.name: Roll Angle
data_fields.comment: -180 <= Roll Angle <= 180

items.name: Mode S MB Data
items.comment: Mode S Comm B data as extracted from the aircraft transponder.

items.name: MB Data
items.comment: 56-bit message conveying Mode S Comm B message data

items.name: BDS1
items.comment: Comm B Data Buffer Store 1 Address

items.name: BDS2
items.comment: Comm B Data Buffer Store 2 Address

items.name: ACAS Resolution Advisory Report
items.comment: Currently active Resolution Advisory (RA), if any, generated by the ACAS associated with the transponder transmitting the report and threat identity data.

data_fields.name: MB DATA
data_fields.comment: 56-bit message conveying Mode S Comm B message data of BDS Register 3,0.

items.name: Surface Capabilities and Characteristics
items.comment: Operational capabilities of the aircraft while on the ground.

items.name: POA
items.comment:
Position Offset Applied
0 Position transmitted is not ADS-B position reference point
1 Position transmitted is the ADS-B position reference point

items.name: CDTI/S
items.comment:
Cockpit Display of Traffic Information Surface
0 CDTI not operational
1 CDTI operational

items.name: B2 low
items.comment:
Class B2 transmit power less than 70 Watts
0 >= 70 Watts
1 < 70 Watts

items.name: RAS
items.comment:
Receiving ATC Services
0 Aircraft not receiving ATC-services
1 Aircraft receiving ATC services

items.name: IDENT
items.comment:
Setting of "IDENT"-switch
0 IDENT switch not active
1 IDENT switch active

data_fields.name: Surface Capabilities and Characteristics First Extension : Length / Width of Aircraft

items.name: L+W
items.comment: Length and width of the aircraft

items.name: Data Ages
items.comment: Ages of the data provided.

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the latest received information transmitted in item I021/008.

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last update of the Target Report Descriptor, item I021/040

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last update of the Mode 3/A Code, item I021/070

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the latest information received to update the Quality Indicators, item I021/090

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the last update of the Trajectory Intent information updating item I021/110

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the latest measurement of the message amplitude, item I021/132

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the information contained in item 021/140

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Flight Level information in item I021/145

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Intermediate State Selected Altitude in item I021/146

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Final State Selected Altitude in item I021/148

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Air Speed contained in item I021/150

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the value for the True Air Speed in item I021/151

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the value for the Magnetic Heading in item I021/152

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Barometric Vertical Rate contained in I021/155

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Geometric Vertical Rate in item I021/157

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Ground Vector in item I021/160

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of item I021/165 Track Angle Rate

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Target Identification in item I021/170

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Target Status as contained in item I021/200

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Meteorological data contained in I021/220

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the Roll Angle value as in item I021/230

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the latest update of an active ACAS Resolution Advisory

data_fields.name: Age
data_fields.comment: Age of the latest information received on the surface capabilities and characteristics of the respective target

data_fields.name: RID
data_fields.comment: Designator of Ground Station in Distributed System.
